text: Aey meri qaum ke logon! Aaj tumhein baadshahi hasil hai aur zameen mein tum gaalib ho, lekin agar khuda ka azaab humpar aa gaya to phir kaun hai jo hamari madad kar sakega?” Firoun ne kaha “Main to tum logon ko wahi rai dey raha hoon jo mujhey munasib nazar aati hai aur main usi raaste ki taraf tumhari rehnumayi karta hoon jo theek hai”
